channel.title: dockerfile on The Tech Underbelly
channel.description: Recent content in dockerfile on The Tech Underbelly

item.title: Dockerfile CMD vs ENTRYPOINT
item.description: Introduction ENTRYPOINT is the command that is run CMD is the parameter passed to the command. FROM ubuntu ENTRYPOINT ["sleep"] CMD ["5m"] For example in this case we are overriding the default command of ubuntu docker image with sleep command and the default parameters for that command is 5m.
